attributes.action: COVID vaccinations should be given to grocery delivery drivers and store workers
attributes.additional_details: I want them to do this to keep the workers safe and the customers safe. Keep the stores open and less likely to close due to staff catching it.
attributes.background: The government should put the job workers in supermarkets and the van drivers that go to peoples houses should get the vaccination sooner as they are on the front line and if someone gets it then in theory store should shut so then people can’t get there groceries,

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567426
